definition: to attack for a long time without success
(long) time/(long) duration of time
to attack/to accuse/to study
(negative prefix)/not/no
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Sugar for many is something they may have been battling with for a long time, but the past is the past.
sentences.chinese: 對許多人來說，糖也許早就是久攻不下的頑疾了。
